That's beyond awesome. :-D Congrats, allstories.

Still a damn awesome piece of fan-art. The helmet came out really well!

title: w00t
content:
Posting again from work to compliment this. I saved it and zoomed in--you did a fair bit of dithering at the edges, and I'd wager you did it all by hand. It looks very nice; gives the entire piece a hand-drawn feel. That's absolutely solid work, Allstories. I can't get over how nice your helmet looks. It's the perfect shape, and your shading placement is superb.

Any details on how you went about piecing this together? What order did you draw things, outline, shade, etc.? Are you a dark-to-light person, or light-to-dark, how did you do this? It's awesome!

title: Re: w00t
content: I did the outline, then the colors, then the shading, and finished by anti-aliasing it by hand. I have no idea why I forgot to shade his left hand, though.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]
